"Now that will depend on what she was doing, no?  At any rate, I do
not wis=
h to fight you.  

"At any rate, our main threat is Unicron, and whether or=
 not she is
loyal to him now; she will be able to provide us with informati=
on
either way.  Information which I would be more than willing to share
wit=
h you and the other leaders."

Guardia moved from a defensive posture to a =
more relaxed (but still
uneasy) posture.

Meanwhile...

Celeron was pleased=
 that the weapons had rendered Blacknightmare
unconcious, however he was so=
mewhat upset that that was the only use
of the weapons in the skirmish; tho=
ugh he truly didn't want to have to
get involved.
